markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Axial Recall](/Feats.aspx?ID=3109) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Automaton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=398" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 43</row>

</column>

---

You have reconfigured the magical resonance of your core to attune to the planar energies of [Axis](/Planes.aspx?ID=14). You can cast [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) twice per week as an arcane innate spell that can only target yourself; you can travel only to Axis or the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1), and your body serves as the focus component.
name: Axial Recall
